description:
The battle at the school continues on. Kato engages the RWS to keep anyone from leaving school grounds and then he deploys the Cube, a war machine, to aid in taking down Saruta.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Maiden`s Chest Is a Precious Thing
La poitrine d`une jeune fille est un trésor
Otome no Mune wa Totemo Taisetsu na Mono na no
乙女の胸はとても大切なものなの
